alert.note: Alert for Pierce (Wisconsin) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 05 at 3:00PM CDT by NWS Minneapolis
info.description: ...SMALL STREAM FLOODING EXPECTED... Thunderstorms with heavy rain will cause minor flooding in the following counties... Pierce... * Until 700 PM CDT. * At 259 PM CDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. Radar estimates show two to three inches of rain has fallen in the last 3 hours. This will cause small stream flooding in the area. * Some locations that will experience minor flooding include... Plum City, Esdaile and Hager City.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. In hilly terrain there are hundreds of low water crossings which are potentially dangerous in heavy rain. Do not attempt to cross flooded roads. Find an alternate route.
